description: Regional accident type patterns to diversify city content
source: Based on FARS data regional patterns and climate factors

rearEnd.localFactor: Dense urban traffic and frequent congestion in metro areas lead to rear-end collisions

jackknife.localFactor: Winter ice and snow on narrow highways cause jackknife incidents

sideswipe.localFactor: Tight lanes on older highways increase sideswipe accidents

rollover.localFactor: Winding rural roads and mountainous terrain contribute to rollovers

headOn.localFactor: Two-lane highways without barriers increase head-on collision risk

other.localFactor: Loading dock accidents and urban delivery incidents
